title: Energy Supplements | Energy Balance Gut Connection
description: Gut Connection Energy Balance is formulated to help improve digestive health with a combination of ingredients that focus on energy production. Shop now.
cleaned_text: - On Sale Gut Connection® Energy Balance For all-day power that won't quit, start in the gut. Good gut health is known for aiding easy digestion and helping keep our bodies regular, but a balanced gut microbiome can also help maintain normal energy levels.** Gut Connection® Energy Balance is scientifically formulated to help improve digestive health with a winning combination of clinically tested ingredients that focus on energy production. This formula contains Epicor® dried yeast fermentate to help maintain good digestive and immune health, B-Vitamins to support energy production, elevATP® to support the body's production of ATP at the cellular level, and Coffeeberry® to provide naturally occurring caffeine to support energy and alertness.** Gut Connection® by Country Life® is a scientifically formulated range of supplements that connects the gut to individual health issues that matter. Try any product from the Gut Connection line with confidence, with our Money Back Guarantee. MONEY BACK GUARANTEE You'll love it! If you are not completely satisfied, request a refund in 60 days. See details at [www.GutConnectionRebate.com](https://www.countrylifevitamins.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/money-back-rebate.pdf) or call 877-322-8355.
